definition[0]: behaving in a way that is unusual and different from most people
example[0]: His eccentric behaviour lost him his job.
example[1]: Aunt Nessy was always a bit eccentric.
definition[1]: eccentric circles do not have the same centre point
definition[2]: someone who behaves in a way that is different from what is usual or socially accepted
example[2]: I was regarded as something of an eccentric.
